patthana1.9:247.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.9:247.2: dassanena pahātabbaṃ rāgaṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana1.9:247.3: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhiṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.

patthana1.9:247.5: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati. #1

patthana1.9:340.16: cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, sotaṃ … pe …
patthana1.9:340.23: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.9:340.31: vatthu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:340.33: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:341.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.9:341.3: taṃ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, sotaṃ … pe …
patthana1.9:341.7: vatthu dassanena pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.9:342.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.9:342.3: taṃ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjati, sotaṃ … pe …
patthana1.9:342.7: vatthu bhāvanāya pahātabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.9:343.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.9:343.4: dassanena pahātabbo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā ca vatthu ca … pe …. #1
patthana1.9:344.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.9:344.4: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:344.6: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:344.8: dassanena pahātabbā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.9:345.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbassa … pe ….
patthana1.9:347.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.9:350.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe aṭṭha, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
patthana1.9:353.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.9:354.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.9:355.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.9:356.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.9:357.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.9:358.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.9:359.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.9:360.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.9:361.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.9:362.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.9:363.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.9:364.1: Dassanena pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.9:365.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.9:366.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.9:370.1: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe cuddasa, naadhipatiyā cuddasa, naanantare cuddasa, nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye cuddasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane cuddasa, nakamme cuddasa, navipāke cuddasa, naāhāre cuddasa, naindriye cuddasa, najhāne cuddasa, namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.9:373.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.9:376.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe aṭṭha, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
